eeta passe anurayayi wijeyi karabagena eluwo tikath aran giyalu gedara.pithara undath ewele hithanna athi katawath mattu nowuna mun denna meda para mattu une me pitharayata kiyala neh.pahuwada eliyawatuna gaman pithara unda enawalu anurayalage thaththawa hamba wenna.ee weddi dabala indala na iskole gihin.iskole kiwwata ee kale uganwala thiyenne pansale .passe kaleka game pansale nayaka hamuduruwo mul wela thama gamatama kiyala iskolayak hada gaththe.ithin ara pithara unda anuralage thaththata duka duka kiya kiya polawe pas kanawalu.anurayage thaththatath wela thiyena de mokadda kiyala hithaganna bariwa ee gana ahaddi “umbaama warenko awilla balapan mage wagawata karala thiyena aparade“ kiyala thaththawath ekkagena elawalu kotuwata giyalu.
